Description: Two beads A: spherical bead, made of glass, corroded to a pearlescent colour, bluish traces at one end, with one glass filament running around the body, now in white colour. B: bead roughly disc-shaped, polished on one side, made of a brownish-black stone, the edges are rough and unfinished.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
